Wellen -- a framework for exploring and teaching generative music making and algorithmic compositions

See Wellen for further information.

Package wellen

Class Arpeggiator

java.lang.Object
wellen.Arpeggiator
public class Arpeggiator extends Object
creates a sequence of notes based on an input pattern.
